prompt: Create an edit profile page with a bold, high-contrast theme. Feature a large circular profile picture at the top center with a thick black border and a camera icon at the top-right. Include input fields for full name, email, phone number, and bio, each with a white background and bold black borders. Use a black background with yellow accents for buttons and focused fields. Arrange the layout in a scrollable column with moderate spacing. The save button should be a bright yellow button with black text. Include an app bar with a black background and yellow title text.
